column5: Does anybody know of a spot on the net that has a flow chart for the Red River at Lockport? Thanks, lbdnnut

This may be what you are looking for. http://www.gov.mb.ca/waterstewardshi...er_report.html If you are interested, drove by lockport on the way home from work 4 boats between just after floodway exit to cats on the red. 3 of the 4 had fish on. By the bends in the rods had to be cats. The boats closer to the locks had no activity while I watched. Looks like the bite is on, I'll find out tomorrow lol.
